# killport
a nodejs module to kill any process given their port

Usage
------

For example, you want to kill the process listening on port 8080:

```javascript

var killport = require('killport');

killport(8080)
// if success
.then(function(out){
  console.log(out);
})
// if failed
.catch(function(err){
  console.log(err);
});

```

Support
------

Only works on OS with `lsof` command.
